title: Cant do anything in game
body: ok so i load into a match, and then it wont let me ping,chat,smart ping,cast abilities,press esc,buy items, or anything actuially in game, i can use the actuial launcher fine and open boxes and launch games, but it wont let me play when i load into a game PLS HELP{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
If you're not able to do anything at all while in game, but everything else seems to be working correctly, this might be an issue with your config files. Let's take a quick minute to reset those using a custom game and see if that fixes it!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Hit me back up and let me know if that helped!

Hmmmmmm =\ . Since resetting your config didn't seem to help, the main issue might be something much smaller. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech guys will be able to look much deeper!
